Summary: Dark Grey, size of a blimp.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Meriden
There were no other sightings in Meriden on or around October 21st 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving home from work at around 5:15 p.m. noticed a large cigar shaped object to the west. At first thought it may have been a blimp but driving closer saw that there were no tail fins or nose. The object stayed motionless in the sky and was a non reflective dark grey in appearance. If I had to describe the size I would say that it was the size of the Good year Blimp.
